3 using namespace std::chrono_literals;

5 TurtleSimGoalPublisher::TurtleSimGoalPublisher() : Node("turtlesim_goal_publisher"), goal_id_(0)
6 {
7  //load parameter and create data structure before creating the subscriber to avoid conflict
8  LoadParams();
9 
10  velocity_pub_ = this->create_publisher<geometry_msgs::msg::Twist>("/cmd_vel", 10);
11  turtle_pose_sub_ = this->create_subscription<turtlesim::msg::Pose>("/pose", 10,
12  std::bind(&TurtleSimGoalPublisher::TurtlePoseCallback, this, std::placeholders::_1));
13 }
14 
15 TurtleSimGoalPublisher::~TurtleSimGoalPublisher()
16 {
17  //empty destructor
18 }
19 
20 void TurtleSimGoalPublisher::LoadParams()
21 {
22  //decalre the parameters
23  declare_parameter("proportional_gain.linear", 0.5);
24  declare_parameter("proportional_gain.angular", 0.5);
25  declare_parameter("no_of_goal", 0);
26 
27  //reading parameters
28  proportional_gain_linear_ = get_parameter("proportional_gain.linear").as_double();
29  proportional_gain_angular_ = get_parameter("proportional_gain.angular").as_double();
30  int num_of_goals = get_parameter("no_of_goal").as_int();
31 
32  //reading all goal points iteratively
33  std::vector<std::vector<double>> goals;
34  if(num_of_goals > 0)
35  {
36  for(int id=1; id<= num_of_goals; id++)
37  {
38  //declare parameters iteratively and read it.
39  declare_parameter("goal"+std::to_string(id), std::vector<double>({0.0, 0.0, 0.0}));
40 
41  if(has_parameter("goal"+ std::to_string(id)))
42  goals.push_back(get_parameter("goal"+ std::to_string(id)).as_double_array());
43  else
44  RCLCPP_ERROR(this->get_logger(), "Goal ID: %d is missing.", id);
45  }
46  }
47 
48  //convert data vector to internal structure
49  ConvertDataStructure(goals);
50  RCLCPP_INFO(this->get_logger(), "Loaded all parameters");
51 }
52 
53 void TurtleSimGoalPublisher::TurtlePoseCallback(const turtlesim::msg::Pose::SharedPtr pose)
54 {
55  //check if all goal points have been reached.
56  if(goal_id_ == (int)turtlesim_goals_.size())
57  {
58  RCLCPP_INFO(this->get_logger(), "Reached all points. Shutting down...");
59  rclcpp::shutdown();
60  }
61  else //exectute the movements
62  ControlLoop(ToGeometryPose(*pose));
63 }
64 
65 void TurtleSimGoalPublisher::ConvertDataStructure(std::vector<std::vector<double>> pts)
66 {
67  for (auto pt:pts)
68  {
69  //check if the goal point size is correct
70  if(pt.size() != 3){
71  RCLCPP_ERROR(this->get_logger(), "Skipping point. Goal dimension doesn't match. Got size %d, but required size is\
72  3" , pt.size());
73  continue;
74  }
75 
76  //convert to custom structure for easy handling
77  GoalData goal_pt;
78  goal_pt.pose.x = pt[0];
79  goal_pt.pose.y = pt[1];
80  goal_pt.pose.theta = pt[2];
81  turtlesim_goals_.push_back(goal_pt);
82  }
83 }
84 
85 geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D TurtleSimGoalPublisher::ToGeometryPose(turtlesim::msg::Pose pose)
86 {
87  geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D ret_pose;
88  ret_pose.x = pose.x;
89  ret_pose.y = pose.y;
90  ret_pose.theta = pose.theta;
91 
92  return ret_pose;
93 }
94 
95 bool TurtleSimGoalPublisher::AlignAngle(geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D current_pose, geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D target_pose,
96  float tolerance)
97 {
98  double angle_to_goal = std::atan2(current_pose.y - target_pose.y, current_pose.x - target_pose.x);
99  double angle_error = angle_to_goal - target_pose.theta;
100 
101  if (angle_error > M_PI)
102  angle_error -= 2 * M_PI;
103  if (angle_error < -M_PI)
104  angle_error += 2 * M_PI;
105 
106  geometry_msgs::msg::Twist cmd;
107 
108  RCLCPP_INFO_THROTTLE(this->get_logger(), *this->get_clock(), kLoggingRate, "Angle to goal: %lf Current angle: %lf\
109  Angle error: %lf", angle_to_goal, target_pose.theta, std::abs(angle_error));
110 
111  if(std::abs(angle_error) > tolerance)
112  {
113  cmd.angular.z = proportional_gain_angular_ * angle_error;
114  velocity_pub_->publish(cmd);
115 
116  //return false if the error is higher than tolerance
117  return false;
118  }
119  else
120  return true;
121 }
122 
123 bool TurtleSimGoalPublisher::MoveToGoal(geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D current_pose, geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D target_pose,
124  float tolerance)
125 {
126  geometry_msgs::msg::Twist cmd;
127  double dx = target_pose.x - current_pose.x;
128  double dy = target_pose.y - current_pose.y;
129  double distance = std::sqrt(dx * dx + dy * dy);
130  double direction = std::atan2(dy, dx);
131 
132  RCLCPP_INFO_THROTTLE(this->get_logger(), *this->get_clock(), kLoggingRate, "Distance to goal: %lf Current x: %lf,\
133  Current y: %lf, Direction: %lf", distance, current_pose.x, current_pose.y, direction);
134 
135  if (distance > tolerance)
136  {
137  cmd.linear.x = proportional_gain_linear_ * distance * std::cos(direction - current_pose.theta);
138  velocity_pub_->publish(cmd);
139  return false;
140  }
141  else
142  return true;
143 }
144 
145 void TurtleSimGoalPublisher::ControlLoop(geometry_msgs::msg::Pose2D current_turtle_pose)
146 {
147  RCLCPP_INFO_THROTTLE(this->get_logger(), *this->get_clock(), 3000, "Moving to goal ID: %d", goal_id_);
148  if(!turtlesim_goals_[goal_id_].isComplete)
149  {
150  //Step 1: Align with goal
151  if(!AlignAngle(turtlesim_goals_[goal_id_].pose, current_turtle_pose, 0.01))
152  return;
153 
154  // Step 2: Move to goal
155  if(!MoveToGoal(current_turtle_pose, turtlesim_goals_[goal_id_].pose, 0.1))
156  return;
157 
158  // Step 3: Align with goal orientation
159  if(!AlignAngle(turtlesim_goals_[goal_id_].pose, current_turtle_pose, 0.01))
160  return;
161 
162  //update the goal state and ID after completing the goal
163  turtlesim_goals_[goal_id_].isComplete = true;
164  goal_id_++;
165  }
166 }

168 int main(int argc, char ** argv)
169 {
170 
171  rclcpp::init(argc, argv);
172  rclcpp::spin(std::make_shared<TurtleSimGoalPublisher>());
173  rclcpp::shutdown();
174  return 0;
175 }
